titles.title: To provide reforms through the Organic Act of Guam.
To provide reforms through the Organic Act of Guam.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs.

committee.subcommittee: Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This bill amends the Organic Act of Guam to prohibit any law varying the compensation of the Governor, Lieutenant Governor, or Senators in the Guam Legislature from taking effect until a general election of the legislature shall have intervened.
